lg.l:
kalpātikrūrakālabhrukuṭikuṭilatākalpakalpāgramuṣṭiḥ
krudhyatkālīkaṭākṣāṃkita iva kalatim e
kāṃtakālī |

krīḍaty asyākrameṇa krakacakṛtikṛtī kuṃbhikuṃbhāṃgrakūṭakroḍeṣūtkṛttakaṃṭhotthitarudhirakaṇākīrṇakoṇaḥ kṛpā
|| 1 ||

khaṃ preṃkhadbhiḥ kharāṃśoḥ prakharakharaśikhā khaṃḍayan svair mayūkhaiḥ
khelāsaṃkhyeṣu khaṃjīkṛtaraṇarasikaḥ saṃmukhānāṃ khanitraṃ |

khyātaḥ
saukhyasya khāniḥ khalu kamitṛjuṣāṃ khecarīṇām akharvaḥ
khelaty utkhātakhaḍgapratiyuvasu khanatkāravān asya khaḍgaḥ || 2 ||

gāḍhaṃ gātrasya guptigrahaṇam avagaṇayyāgrataḥ svargamārgaṃ
grasyatrasyagrahāgresarakaraguṇitodagrajāgradgabhastiḥ |

garvogragranthigotragrahilaripugaṇagrāsabhaṅgīgṛhīto
garjaty agresarāgryagrahagilanaguruḥ saṃgare maṇḍalāgraḥ || 3 ||
ghrāṇaṃ saṃgrāmalakṣmyā ghanasṛtiyaśasām aṅghritugho mahapaghnaḥ sāhasasyālaghuhṛdayalaghur bhītyaghaughasya vighnaḥ |

ghoṭaḥ kīrter ghanābhāpaghanagajaghaṭāghātanair ghṛṇyanighno
ghūrṇaty uraghṛṇisamāghrātighoro 'sya khaḍgaḥ || 4 ||

caṃḍaś caṃḍīśacakṣuś cirabhṛtaviṣamārcidhvajāc cānubhāle
caṃḍyāś cāmīkarābhe ṃjanacayaravacitaṃ kauryacaṃcuḥ |

citraṃ svācāṃtavīrāsur api ravirucaā cumbitaś cākacikyāc
cakṣuḥkarmāṇi cūṣaty acirarucirucāṃ vaṃcako 'syāsir uccaiḥ || 5 ||

yānurūpocchalitaripuśucau chādanaṃ kṛcchravṛṣṭau
chāyāvāhāśanesracchalasamiti lasacchauryakālālipuccham |

chātacchātri chiduragaṇacaṇaḥ chekahṛcchokakārī
chāyākāntacchavīcchāvyatikaravaśato mūrcchatīddho 'sya khaḍgaḥ || 6 ||

jaṃghālo jaitrajanyājirabhuvi te jvarārttiṃ
jīvātur bāhujasya trijagati jayino dorbhujaṅgasya jihvā |

jyājānir vyāgrajaāgradgajaradanaśilābhajanājasrayo
jvālo jaṭāvān iha jayati jagajjitvaro 'muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 7 ||

jhātkārān_ jaitrajanye jhagiti janayato janmikarṇajvarārttiṃ
jhañjhāvātānukārāñjhaṇajhaṇitijhaṇatkāriṇaḥ projjihaānaḥ |

jhāṣāṅkīṃ tām avasthāṃ jhaṭiti ripujanaṃ grāhayan dhūrjaṭīṣṭā
jhūrannavrāhiteṣūjjhitaraṇarabhasaṃ projjihīte sya khaḍgaḥ || 8 ||

ṭaṃkāroddhaṭṭitā yā jhaṭiti vighaṭayan_ koṭiśaś cāpayaṣṭīṣ
ṭaṃko vidviḍgirīṇāṃ vairiparvatānāṃ karaṭikaṭakaṭāhātikudāgrakoṭiḥ |

duḥkūṭair yaṣṭikūtaiḥ kuṭukuṭilasaṭaiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ koṭisaṃkhyaiḥ
kheṭair durghāṭavāṭān_ pratibhaṭasu.bhaṭāṃṣ ṭīkate muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 9 ||

ṭhātkārī kaṃṭhasīmanyatikaṭhinatare skaṃdhapīṭhe kaṭhore
pṛṣṭhāṣṭhīlānukāre śaṭhakamaṭhapateḥ kuṃbhapṛṣṭhe 'pi caibhe |
drākakdrāghiṣṭhaḥ kaṭhoracchavijaraṭhataradyotasaṃghaṭṭamūrchatkoṣṭhāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ prakurvan_ ripuśirasi luṭhaty etadīyaḥ kuṭhāraḥ || 10 ||
ḍiṃbho daṃḍādhayuyudhasya pradhanaghanataḍiccaṃḍadoḥ kuṃḍalīndrakṣveḍaḥ ddaṃḍadarpadviradananigaḍo ḍiṃḍimaḥ śauryabharttuḥ |
asya prācaṃḍyabhāṃḍaṃ dhṛtamadhupagaladgaṃḍavetuṃḍaśuṃḍākāṃḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ vitanvan_ yudhi dhutajaḍimā hiṃḍalāgraḥ || 11 ||

ḍhakkāsvārūḍhakīrttiprasṛtisuvijayaśrīvivoḍhā nirūḍho
vāḍhaṃ soḍhātigāḍhapraharaṇasamitau līḍhakoṣṇāstrasīdhu

gūḍhapraharttur draḍhimakulagṛhaṃ nyastaśastreṣu ṣaṃḍho
nirvyūḍhodgāḍhayuddhapratihatisu dṛḍhaṃ ḍhaukate muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 12 ||

prāṇā darpasya pāṇī śiśo kārmaṇaṃ dveṣaṇānāṃ
tūrṇaṃ sadvārabāṇavraṇakaraṇakṛtī kīrṇadurmarṣaṇārciḥ |

koṣṇadviṭ_śoṇitāktaḥ kharakiraṇaghṛṇiśreṇiśāṇo ’ruṇaśrīr
udgūrṇo vāraṇānāṃ gaṇam asṛṇi śṛṇāty asya tīkṣṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ || 13 ||
tṛpyaddaṃtikṣitīṃdraṃ taralatarataratpattibhaṃgaṃ vighūrṇattuṅgāvarttagarttaṃ niśitatamamilatkuṃtasaṃtānanakram |

tvaṃgattīkṣṇāsitūrvattimim anatidalacchaktiśuktiṃ raṇābdhiṃ
tāras tīrṇaṃ titīrṣuvavad arīn asya khaḍgaḥ stṛṇeḍhi || 14 ||

sthūlaṃ sthūlaṃ śvasadbhiḥ prathitapṛthupṛṣadvīkṣaṇais taīrthamātraṃ
saṃmanvānair apārthaṃ śithilaraṇakathair vepathuvyarthaśastraiḥ ||

saṃprāptaiḥ sthāṇusaṃsthāṃ prathitapathacarais trastanetrātithitvaṃ
nītaḥ pratyarthisārthair vyathayati savidhasthān apīddho sya khaḍgaḥ || 15 ||
dṛpyaddoḥkālakūṭadrumataruṇadalaṃ darpadaṃtāvaleṃdradrāghīyodānalekhā daradalitadaleṃdīvaradroṇidehaḥ |
dīvyannaidādhamadhyaṃdinadivasamaṇidyotaprekṣyadīptirdausthityaṃ dīrghadīrghaṃ dadadarisudṛsāṃ dīpyate ’muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 16 ||

dhairyasyādhārayaṣṭir dhṛtavivudhavadhūsādhvaso dhāma dhāmnāṃ
dhūmaḥ krodhānalasya pradhanarathavarasyoddhuro dhūr dharo ‘yam |

dhīrodāttor dhvavāhā dharaṇidharadhṛtas tīkṣṇadhārādharo ‘ddhā
dhīrānauddhatyabhājo raṇadharaṇicarānasya dhūnoti khaḍgaḥ || 17 ||
